thread.title: Sonakshi Sinha supports World Sight Day
thread.title_full: Sonakshi Sinha supports World Sight Day - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sonakshi Sinha supports World Sight Day
text:
Sonakshi is bold and prefers doing things in her own unique way.
READ: Sonakshi Sinha clarifies why she won't marry an actor
The actress is all for noble causes and this time she has joined hands with World Sight Day. In the past she has always been in the forefront to support causes like animal rights, women empowerment et al. She will now be rendering her help for eye vision related conditions and their cure. Sonakshi recently went on to her social media and promoted the same. She indeed has her way of charming everyone with the initiatives she takes.
